section.title: Introduction
section.p: The usecasedocument module provides a resource type which allows to include usecases as documents. Typical usage scenarios are forms on web pages, for instance search forms or contact forms. In contrast to usual usecases which refer to the browser locale for i18n, the document's language is used.
For more information on usecases, please refer to the usecase framework documentation.
